summary: Backend refactoring regression tests PASSED. All 29 API endpoint tests pass (100% success). Frontend pages load correctly. Fixed missing /api/payment-settings public endpoint.

integration_issues.issue: Console error 'Failed to fetch payment settings' - FIXED by adding missing /api/payment-settings endpoint

issues: Minor hydration warning: 'In HTML, <tr> cannot be a child of <span>' - cosmetic issue in table rendering

critical_code_review_comments: Backend refactoring from 4364-line monolithic server.py to modular FastAPI routers is successful - all endpoints work
Minor: Admin dashboard has React hydration warnings due to <span> wrapper inside <tbody> - cosmetic only

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All pages load correctly (Homepage, Portfolio, Booking, Admin Dashboard)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend was refactored from monolithic server.py to modular routers (routes/admin.py, routes/public.py, routes/client.py, routes/payments.py, routes/reminders.py). All API endpoints tested and working. Fixed missing /api/payment-settings endpoint during testing. Booking page URL is /booking not /book.

mocked_apis.payflex: Payflex payment method returns 'coming soon' placeholder

frontend_pages_tested: Booking (/booking) - Loads with session type selection
Admin Dashboard (/admin) - Login works, stats display correctly
